page.title: 13Events
page.content: Ewelme's picturesque setting makes it a popular place to visit as well as a popular place to photogrpah or put onto canvas. Recently professional companies have come to use Ewelmes setting as the background to films. one company spent three weeks filming a televison series called Paradise Postponed, by the writer, John Mortimer. In the film Ewelme is called Rapstone Manor. the second film is a series on well known artists. Hierymous Boschs painting of the Mocking of Christ is reviewed agaist the background of the almshouses at Ewelme. These are said to provide a reasonable comparison with the kind fo background Bosch would have known when he was alive.
